sentence.Network_en: If you are wrong then, a fortiori, so am I.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你都错了, 那就更别说我了.

sentence.Network_en: If you can afford a car then, a fortiori, you can afford a bicycle.
sentence.Network_cn: 你如果买得起一辆小汽车, 买辆脚踏车更不用说了.

sentence.Network_en: It could not have been finished in a week, a fortiori not in a day.
sentence.Network_cn: 这事本来就不能在一星期内完成, 更不用说一天了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: fortiori是什么意思|fortiori的中文意思... ... fortiori ： 理由更充足地 argumentum a fortiori ： 当然解释.

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... a form of address 称呼 a fortiori 更加 a free hand 放手干的权利.
法律翻译常用拉丁词汇 | 法律英语翻译 ... A dessein 故意 A fortiori 更不用说 A gratia 恩赐.
